description.text: Front-end software developer with +10 yearsâ€™ experience committed to professional growth. Experienced in developing software that include data mining and processing scripts, instrument interfacing, web apps, and mobile software.
Accomplished in managing multidisciplinary groups, cross-cultural communication, and building relationships between industry and government.
Looking to further contribute to international development initiatives in advisory roles to facilitate the growth of the organizations and their initiatives in a sustainable manner.
Directed a national task force to create and implement a pilot project for teachers in distance education using eLearning platforms in Mozambique, Ministry of Education.

Initiated, designed and implemented a knowledge management system that improved product development and reduced the training time from 18 months down to 6 months: a 300% (measured) productivity improvement, which equates to half a million dollars in savings.
Programming: Ruby on Rails, Python/Django, PHP, Javascript, CSS, HTML, Swift, Objective-C, Visual Basic/VBA, bash scripting, familiar with C/C++, and Java
Web platforms: Nginx, Node.js, Apache, LAMP, MAMP
Tools: Git/Bitbucket, Trello, vim, Asana, Slack, Jira, Redmine, LabView
OS environments: Linux, OS X, Microsoft Windows + cygWIN
